title: Customizing Scrollbar Styles with CSS
description: In this lab, we will be exploring how to customize the scrollbar style using CSS. We will use the ::-webkit-scrollbar property to style the scrollbar, including the scrollbar track and thumb. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to create custom scrollbars and enhance the user experience of your website.
